name: Ghost in a Box
description:
Ghost in a Box is a puzzle platformer that takes place in the living world and the land of the dead. Play as a lost person and travel between the two worlds to make new discoveries!

This game was made for Mini Jam 102.

Controls:

Human: AD to move, Space to jump

Ghost: WASD to move

Hold R to reset a level

Credits:

Programming, Art, Music - gearless_june

Level Design - Busy Hamster/Jeffrey
